Software Engineering and Cloud Architecture

I am a solutions architect with a strong systems background and a lot of experience with cloud architecture and DevOps methodologies. I have a passion for learning new technologies and enjoy taking on challenging projects. I excel at quickly understanding complex problems in order to provide optimal, simple and maintainable solutions. The last several years I've been working as a Systems Development Engineer at AWS where I've been working on improving developer workflows and experiences. While there I have also facilitated the launch of multiple AWS services globally. Currently I am working as a Solutions Architect in the Brisbane area for AWS.
